artist: Kawase Hasui; Published by Kawaguchi Jirō; Carved by Maeda Kentarō; Printed by Komatsu Wasankichi
marks: bottom margin: 昭和四年八月作 {Shōwa yonen hachigatsu sak LLC: 巴水 {Hasui}
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
text:
The original Benten Pond that belonged to Zōjō Temple does not exist anymore in its size. All that remains is a small pond at the southeast of Tokyo Tower in what is now Shiba Park.
second edition published by Kawaguchi alone
title: Benten Pond at Shiba
